issues.problem: <div> with onClick handler used as interactive control without role or keyboard support
issues.impact: Keyboard and screen reader users cannot activate this control.
issues.recommendedFix: Replace <div onClick> with <button type="button"> or add role="button", tabindex="0", and onKeyDown handler.

issues.problem: Icon-only button has no accessible name
issues.impact: Screen readers announce this as 'button' with no description.
issues.recommendedFix: Add aria-label describing the button's purpose (e.g. aria-label="Close menu").

issues.impact: Screen readers cannot describe the image. Users see no text when image fails to load.
issues.recommendedFix: Add alt attribute with descriptive text, or alt="" if decorative.

issues.problem: Next.js Image component missing alt prop
issues.impact: Screen readers cannot describe the image.
issues.recommendedFix: Add alt prop with descriptive text.

issues.problem: <input> uses placeholder as its only label
issues.impact: Label disappears when user types. Screen readers may not announce it.
issues.recommendedFix: Add a visible <label> or aria-label attribute.

issues.impact: Screen readers cannot identify this input.
issues.recommendedFix: Add a <label> with matching for/id, or add aria-label.

issues.impact: Screen readers announce this as 'link' with no description.

issues.problem: Redundant role: <nav> already has implicit role 'navigation'
issues.impact: Clutters the accessibility tree. No functional harm but reduces code clarity.

issues.problem: Element has tabindex="5" â€” positive tabindex disrupts natural focus order
issues.impact: Focus order becomes unpredictable for keyboard users.
issues.recommendedFix: Change to tabindex="0" and rely on DOM order.

issues.problem: <div> with onClick handler used as interactive control without role or keyboard support
issues.impact: Keyboard and screen reader users cannot activate this control.
Screen readers do not announce the modal context.
issues.recommendedFix: Add role="dialog" and aria-modal="true" to the modal container.

issues.impact: Screen readers do not announce dynamic notifications.
issues.recommendedFix: Add aria-live="polite" (or "assertive" for urgent alerts) to the toast container.
